name: CD

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: '3.8'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m venv venv
          source venv/bin/activate
          pip install -r requirements.txt
          
      #custom_linter_v1      
      - name: Run custom linter
        run: |
          source venv/bin/activate
          python custom_linter_v1.py my_app tests
